verses.name: Matthew 11:12
verses.text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.

verses.name: Matthew 11:13
verses.text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John.

verses.name: Matthew 11:14
verses.text: And if ye will receive it, this is Elias, which was for to come.

verses.name: Matthew 11:15
verses.text: He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.

verses.name: Matthew 11:16
verses.text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation? It is like unto children sitting in the markets, and calling unto their fellows,

verses.name: Matthew 11:17
verses.text: And saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned unto you, and ye have not lamented.
